column5: Hi, Has anyone been to Camp Narrows on the North Arm of Rainy Lake? What did you think of the accomodations, boats, staff, and food? I am thinking about a trip early to mid-August. What did you like? What did you think could be better? Would you go back? I have fished Eagle twice and thought I would try something different. All comments are appreciated. Nimstug nimstugatyahoo.com
